description.part2: (SGN) is the federation of French student esports and gaming associations. We organize many national tournaments and actively promote student esports.

description.part1: We have worked with many actors in the video game sector
description.part2: who continue to trust us year after year.

about.title: About
about.head: The Student Gaming Network is the federation of student esports associations from schools and universities in France. SGN aims to promote video games and student esports in all its forms.

section1.title: The Student Gaming Network
section1.text1: The {sgn} is the federation of student esports associations from schools and universities in France. SGN aims to promote video games and student esports in all its forms. Proud of its 60 member associations, SGN wants to make the students' voice heard in esports and support projects created by students for students!
section1.text2: These objectives are structured around 3 main axes at SGN:
section1.text4: Support associative life in France and on campuses
section1.text5: Bring students closer to the professional world of esports and video games

section2.title: Recruitment
section2.text1: The {sgn} is always looking for new talents to join the team. You can check {job} and see if you want to work with us.
section2.text2: You can then fill out this {form}, and we will contact you to discuss further!

admin.title: Administration
admin.head: This admin panel is only accessible to SGN members. All information here is confidential; you must not copy or take screenshots.

denialReasons.expired: This certificate does not seem valid for this year
denialReasons.format: This is not a school certificate or student card
denialReasons.highSchool: This certificate seems to come from a high school, but high schoolers are not considered students
denialReasons.minor: Minors are not accepted in SGN competitions

association.name: is the student gaming association of
association.region: It is part of the region
association.isMember: You are currently a member of this association.
association.otherAssociation: You are part of another association.
association.inviteCode: Enter the association's invitation code. You can ask the association manager for it, it looks like XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

federation.title: Federation
federation.head: We federate a network of many student gaming and esports associations throughout France. We maintain regular contact with them to support their projects.

map.title: The map
map.head: We federate a network of many student gaming and esports associations throughout France. We maintain regular contact with them to support their projects.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.lost2: We're doing everything we can to locate you!
notFound.lost3: Jean-Mich, haven't you fixed antenna 3 yet? What do we look like now...

partners.title: Partners
partners.head: We share our expertise for organizing esports events and promoting to students with many entities. We are happy to count on their support and skills.
partners.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the partner

tournaments.title: Tournament | Tournaments
tournaments.head: We regularly organize tournaments, some in partnership with big names in video games. We ensure that only French students can participate in our tournaments.
tournaments.playerPerTeam: *{count} player* per team | *{count} players* per team
tournaments.subPerTeam: + *{count} substitute* per team | + *{count} substitutes* per team
tournaments.joinTeamPrompt: Enter the team's invitation code. You can ask the team leader for it, it looks like XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.
tournaments.deleteTeamPrompt: Are you sure you want to delete the team? Invited members will be removed.
tournaments.leaveTeamPrompt: Are you sure you want to leave this team?
tournaments.kickMemberPrompt: Are you sure you want to kick this member from the team?

admin.title: Tournament settings
admin.name: Tournament name
admin.deleteAlert: You do not have permission to delete a tournament. Ask the site administrator or the tournament manager.
admin.deleteConfirm: It is better to archive the tournament. Are you sure you want to delete it? This action is final.

game.title: Game
game.name: Game name
game.coachEnabled: Possibility to have a coach in the team
game.managerEnabled: Possibility to have a manager in the team

management.deleteLogo: Are you sure you want to delete the team logo?
management.addMemberPrompt: Enter the {role}'s email to add to the team:

card.connect: To participate in this tournament, you must first sign up or log in.

team.title: Your team
team.name: Team name
team.description: * These elements can be filled in your profile {settings}.
team.info: Once everything is in order, click "Mark ready" so admins can validate your team.
